protocol.name: P-GSE42007-1
protocol.text: Raw data were normalized using systematic variation normalization, and the log2 of the signal intensity is reported. ID_REF =  VALUE = log2 SVN signal DETECTION P-VALUE =

protocol.name: P-GSE42007-2
protocol.text: Nylon mesh with seedlings grown on the surface was transferred to control media or media containing 1 uM IAA at time 0

protocol.name: P-GSE42007-3
protocol.text: 6 days of growth in 100 umol/m2sec2 continuous cool white light on a nylon screen (03-100/32; Sefar Filtration) pressed tigghtly against 1xMS 1% sucrose media (pH 5.6)

protocol.name: P-GSE42007-4
protocol.text: Root samples were ground in liquid nitrogen and the RNA was extracted using the Qiagen Plant RNeasy kit. The RNA was then precipitated from the eluate with isopropanol

protocol.name: P-GSE42007-5
protocol.text: Approximately 5ug of purified total RNA was processed to produce biotinylated cRNA targets followed by streptavidin-phycoerythrin fluorescent staining according to the standard Affymetrix 3â€™-IVT labeling protocol

protocol.name: P-GSE42007-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 20 ug of labeled cRNA was hybridized for 16 hr at 45 degrees C on the Affymetrix GeneChips. GeneChips were washed and stained using the GeneChip 450 Fluidics Station according to standard Affymetrix operating procedures

protocol.name: P-GSE42007-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G system according to the standard Affymetrix protocol
